description: orange plastic with attached base and juicer arm
text: Juicers of every ilk and material quickly became a familiar staple on the kitchen counter. Rival and National Die Casting Company were the primary contenders in this country. Bright colors, gleaming chrome and robotic shapes were usually the obligatory components. The form of this inexpensive French juicer, however, suggests a Trojan helmet when seen from the side.
title: Orange juicer
